text: Brett Goldstein (born 17 July 1980) is an English actor, comedian, writer, producer, and podcaster. He is known for his role as Roy Kent in the Apple TV+ sports comedy series Ted Lasso. He won two Primetime Emmy Awards for each of the first two seasons. He is also the co-creator of the comedy series Shrinking (2023). Goldstein was born on 17 July 1980 in the Sutton suburb of London, to a British Jewish family. He was educated at Sevenoaks School. He later went to the University of Warwick. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:English movie actors Category:English voice actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television producers Category:English television writers Category:Podcasters Category:Screenwriters from London Category:Comedians from London Category:Actors from London
title: Brett Goldstein
